title: Skin Shards
body: I had three skin shards and I rerolled them and got academy Ekko, I don't own him but I plan on buying him. Does that mean ill get the skin for free or do I have to use orange essence to redeem it ?

replies.body: As long as you own the Skin Permanent (not a shard), then you can unlock the skin after unlocking Ekko.  More information on permanents can be found in our [Hextech Crafting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).  Hope that helps!
You don't have to use essence if you rerolled him. You'll get it for free.
